title: Darius' ult is actually a dash...
body: So technically Darius has more mobility than half the champions in this game.

replies.body: It's also got a pretty short range, and is very situational to pull off more than one kill with the ult.
Situational? If he has black cleaver there isn't a situation that he doesn't have potential to murder the whole team 1v5

Black Cleaver doesn't stop him getting focused in a team fight or small skirmish situation.

Please don't up sell him any more than he needs. He's a great champion and VERY strong, but people should lay off the "OP" calls.
Interesting, if a little niche. I was wondering why the unusual stuff sometimes happened when someone flashed over a wall as I ulted.
